webResources.textAttributionSnippet:
(en) Petition of postcards, letter cards, francoenvelopes and booklets. IN
middle rives maps for making the booklet by hand. T.h. stands
Gerhard Horn. (Detail of this image is fitted elsewhere in
the cardboard) - https://www.europeana.eu/item/916120/pm_photo_POST002829. Postmuseet - https://digitaltmuseum.se/011014661813. Public Domain Mark - http://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/mark/1.0/
